title: Bahamas Inflation Rate MoM
description: The Consumer Price Index in Bahamas increased 0.10 percent in August of 2022 over the previous month. Inflation Rate MoM in Bahamas averaged 0.16 percent from 1995 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 2.80 percent in January of 2015 and a record low of -1 percent in April of 2020. Inflation Rate MoM measures month over month change in the price of goods and services. This page provides - Bahamas Inflation Rate MoM- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Department of Statistics of The Bahamas
